title: Which Naruto episodes have Hinata in them? - Quora

response.answer_text: Here’s round about list of Episode Hinata is on the Screen :pEpisode 1Episode 3Episode 23-Episode 24- first chuunin exam test, helping Naruto cheatEpisode 25Episode 37Episode 44Episode 45-Episode 46 & 47- Hinata vs Neji-Episode 59- Talking in training grounds before fighting in last round of Chuunin exams-Episode 60- Episode 148-151 Search for the rare Bikochu beetle/Fighting those weird bee ninjasEpisode 158-Episode 159 & 160- Naruto, Kiba and Hinata try catching a bounty hunter-Episode 175 & 176- Mission to find buried treasure-Episode 187-191- Escorting a caravan/finding out they have to protect Princess Haruna, blah blah blah. Hinata is in all of them but it is mostly 189-190-Episode 194- Entering a haunted castle-Episode 197-201- Gennou plants bombs in Konoha, everyone works to deactivate themEpisode 220 Last episode of Naruto, saying goodbye. I hope I didn't miss any episodes but that about sums up Naruto Part 1. Naruto Shippuden Part 2: Episode 1 (cant remember if shes in this one, his first day back in Konoha)-Episode 33- Asking around for a partner to go on a mission-Episode 90-112- Capturing 3 tails arc.-Episode 122- Chasing after Sasuke, and encountering Kabuto (I think there might be more episodes to this one)-Episode 165-167- Hinata confronts PainEpisode 169 Hinata wakes up from fighting PainEpisode 175 Hero of the Hidden Leaf, everyone cheers for Naruto yay!Episode 176Episode 219Episode 220-Episode 232- The girls get-together-Episode 236- Friends you can count on, Team 8 helps Shino trainEpisode 271-Episode 279- Team 8 investigates cave with white Zetsu-Episode 306- The hearts eye, Neji and Hinata train. Neji tries to get Eyebright plant so she can see fireworks with Naruto-Episode 311- Prologue of Road to NinjaEpisode 321Episode 330 Last but not least, omakes (clips at end of shows) Episode 33 Kiba and Hinata reminiscingEpisode 87 Team 8 at the riverEpisode 95 Ramen eating contestEpisode 96 Valentines DayEpisode 103 Kibas sense of smellEpisode 105 Blank scriptEpisode 110 Eating at IchirakuEpisode 121 Hinata saying "Naruto" in studioEpisode 134 Hinata in bunny outfitEpisode 142 Sakura is trying to be Hinata saying "Naruto" (wannabe!)Episode 165 Sakura and Hinata on stage, Sakura is jelly of herEpisode 168 Guy interviewing Hinata Phew, thats alot of episodes. Hope you enjoy :D

It is in all of the Naruto episodes that she is in.!
